comments.creator: cab26715@live.com
comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0b11pre) Gecko/20110201 Firefox/4.0b11pre
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0b11pre) Gecko/20110201 Firefox/4.0b11pre

When restoring a previous session using only the default window (first run), the tabs remain under the menu bar even in full screen mode.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Use only the default window from first run to open some tabs.
2. Close Minefield using Minefield ---> Exit.
3. Restore the previous session.
4. Tabs will remain underneath the Minefield menu even when switching to full screen mode.
Actual Results:  
Tabs drop below the Minefield menu during restore from the first run window.

Expected Results:  
Tabs should remain on top when restoring.
comments.author: cab26715@live.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0b11pre) Gecko/20110201 Firefox/4.0b11pre
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0b11pre) Gecko/20110201 Firefox/4.0b11pre

When restoring a previous session using only the default window (first run), the tabs remain under the menu bar even in full screen mode.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Use only the default window from first run to open some tabs.
2. Close Minefield using Minefield ---> Exit.
3. Restore the previous session.
4. Tabs will remain underneath the Minefield menu even when switching to full screen mode.
Actual Results:  
Tabs drop below the Minefield menu during restore from the first run window.

Expected Results:  
Tabs should remain on top when restoring.
Step 1 should be "Start Minefield and make the window full screen (NOT F11)", then steps 1, 2, 3 and 4 above will be 2, 3, 4 and 5.
comments.author: cab26715@live.com
comments.creator: cab26715@live.com
comments.raw_text: Step 1 should be "Start Minefield and make the window full screen (NOT F11)", then steps 1, 2, 3 and 4 above will be 2, 3, 4 and 5.

comments.text: This works fine if you open a new window, close the original one (about:home), and then restore the tabs that you opened in the new window.
comments.author: cab26715@live.com
comments.creator: cab26715@live.com
comments.raw_text: This works fine if you open a new window, close the original one (about:home), and then restore the tabs that you opened in the new window.

comments.author: cab26715@live.com
comments.text:
Sorry.....one final note.....

If the window is NOT full screen, you open tabs, exit and restore, when you move the window to full screen from partial screen the tabs correctly go to the top in full screen and drop below when non-full screen.
comments.raw_text:
Sorry.....one final note.....

If the window is NOT full screen, you open tabs, exit and restore, when you move the window to full screen from partial screen the tabs correctly go to the top in full screen and drop below when non-full screen.
comments.creator: cab26715@live.com
